thread.title: See Chris Young Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter
thread.title_full: See Chris Young Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: See Chris Young Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter hotel offers affordable lodging for the Chris Young concert in Atlanta on October 23, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 06, The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Perimeter Center hotel North in Sandy Springs, Georgia offers affordable accommodations for the Chris Young "I'm Comin' Over" concert tour in Atlanta on October 23. The concert venue is Verizon Wireless Amphitheatre at Encore Park. The popular country music star will release his fifth studio album this fall. Special guests will be new country music sensation Eric Paslay and country newcomer Clare Dunn.
"Chris Young fans will find convenient and affordable lodging at our Atlanta Perimeter hotel ," explains Shabbir Lightwala, General Manager at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter. "We are located a short drive from Verizon Wireless Amphitheater and close to great shopping and dining in the Perimeter Center area," continues Lightwala.
The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter features well appointed guest rooms with free high speed Internet and comfortable Simply Smart beds with a choice of pillows. Roomy Extended Stay Suites offer the added convenience of a microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher. Property amenities include a fitness center, 24-hour business center, and seasonal outdoor pool. Garage parking is free. The complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar, with signature cinnamon rolls, is a delicious way to start the day. As a guest convenience, the hotel provides free weekday shuttle transportation within a 3-mile radius including upscale Perimeter Mall and the Dunwoody MARTA Station.
Current hotel specials include the Romantic Escape Package and Book Early and Save. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points toward free hotel nights. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter is located on Hammond Drive, near the intersection of I-285 and GA 400.
For information about the Chris Young concert in Atlanta, visit www.vzwamp.com . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter Hotel , call 404-250-4450 or visit www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody
The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody is directly off Georgia 400 and I-285. This means they're just minutes from several corporate offices and training centers. Additionally, Buckhead, Sandy Springs, Roswell, the Dunwoody Medical Centers, Northside Hospital, Children's Health Care, St. Joseph's, and the Dunwoody MARTA station are nearby. Enjoy a memorable stay at our modern Perimeter hotel, part of Atlanta's upscale corporate Perimeter Center. With our courteous staff, reasonable rates, and terrific amenities, this Atlanta Perimeter hotel is the place to "Stay Smart" in the Perimeter Center area.
For more information visit: http://www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
